member_organisations:
Compañia Iberica Brogdex S.A. 
Productos CITROSOL, S.A. 
FOMESA FRUITECH, S.L.U.

fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Competition, Environment, Single market, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
- Plant Protection Products (PPP).  
- Maximum residue levels of pesticides in or on food. 
- Food additives. 
- Organic production and labelling of organic products. 
- Machinery for pesticide application. 
- Oganisation of agricultural markets which includes the fruit and vegetables and processed fruit and vegetables sectors. 
- Food losses and food waste.
organisation_name: Agrupación Española de Servicios y Procesos Postcosecha (AGRUPOST)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
- EU Legislative Drafts and Acts 
- DG SANCO Standing Commitees minutes 
- DG SANCO Guidance Documents 
- EFSA Guidance Documents 
- Active substances renewal 
- Revision of PPP Regulations 
- Maximum Residue Level regulations 
- DG AGRI activities 
- ECHA activities
goals__remit:
Defender los intereses y la competitividad  del sector de post-cosecha. 
Aumentar la Seguridad Alimentaria. 
Contribuir a la defensa de la Química sostenible en los tratamientos post-cosecha. 
Contribuir a la reducción del desperdicio de frutas y hortalizas en la cadena alimentaria. 
Defensa de la utilización de productos legales. 
Llevar a cabo estudios técnicos-científicos.
